project_descr: Birac Region Advancement and Cooperation (BIRAC) Phase 2 is aiming at enabling Birac region to maintain its path to inclusive economic growth and full integration into wider national development trends.

outputs.output_descr: Birac Region Advancement and Cooperation (BIRAC) Phase 2 is aiming at enabling Birac region to maintain its path to inclusive economic growth and full integration into wider national development trends.

First Job project in Srebrenica region intends to assist the municipalities of Srebrenica, Bratunac, Milici, Vlasenica and Zvornik to build more inclusive labour markets by promoting an integrated approach to employment and social policies
